document.full_text: a pakistani-born man accused of aiding militants in the 2008 mumbai attacks is set to go on trial in chicago next week in a legal battle that may worsen strained relations between the united states and pakistan.
document.title: u.s. terrorism trial may raise tensions with pakistan
lines_and_colors: a pakistani-born man accused of aiding militants in the 2008 mumbai attacks is set to go on trial in chicago next week in a legal battle that may worsen strained relations between the united states and pakistan.
